shortdesc.ph: Callback for detailed information of a music resource.
Callback for detailed music resource information.
Callback for detailed music resource information.
Callback for detailed information of a music resource.

p.codeblock: final void Function(String requestId, int songCode, String simpleInfo, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason)? onSongSimpleInfoResult;
public abstract void OnSongSimpleInfoResult(string requestId, long songCode, string simpleInfo, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason);

section.p: After you call to retrieve detailed information of a music resource, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to get detailed information about a music resource, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to get detailed information of a music resource, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to retrieve detailed information of a music resource, the SDK triggers this callback.

plentry.pd: Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
The ID of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.

Information about the music resource, including:
Start and end time (ms) of the chorus segment
Download URL for the chorus lyrics
Duration of the chorus segment (ms)
Song name
Artist name
Request status code of the music content center. See .
Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
The ID of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.

Relevant information of the music resource, including:
Start and end time (ms) of the chorus segment
Lyric download URL for the chorus segment
Duration (ms) of the chorus segment
Song name
Artist name
Request status code of the music content center. See .
Request ID. The unique identifier for this request.
Music resource ID used to identify the music resource.

Related information about the music resource, including:
Start and end time (ms) of the chorus segment
Download URL for the chorus lyrics
Duration (ms) of the chorus segment
Song name
Artist name
Request status code from the music content center. See .
The request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
The ID of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.

Information related to the music resource, including:
Start and end time (ms) of the chorus segment
Download URL of the chorus lyrics
Duration (ms) of the chorus segment
Song name
Artist name
The request status code of the Music Content Center. See .
